document_data.name: Foothold
document_data.mainbody: '''''Foothold''''' was a rare [[alteration]] spell of the [[southern magic]] tradition{{Southernmagic}}.
document_data.Effects: The spell caused hands made of stone to rise from the ground, grabbing onto creatures in the target area. Any creature in a 30 ft by 30 ft (9x9 m) area would be affected. Creatures ensnared by the spell could not move, but could attack normally or cast spells, until the spell expired.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required a [[material component]], vulture's claw.
